short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: K Searches is Designed for theme lovers. K Searches will bring a refreshing inspirational feel to your everyday browsing experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
KSearches is designed to give your dashboard a beautiful background theme for a chrome extension with a unique search. KSearches is a unique search extension that provides the best results on different search engines.

By clicking 'ADD TO CHROME', you accept and agree to installing the KSearches.com extension and setting Chromeâ„¢ New Tab to that provided by the service with web search by Bing, and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. The extension will update your search settings and will change your new tab search provider to Microsoft Bing".
